definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The witches are deadly nurses and Banquo is assassinated by handgun and silencer.
sentences.chinese: 女巫成了致命的護士，而班柯被消音手槍刺殺。

sentences.english: The mechanism of noise damping by interlayered alloy was discussed on emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 並着重闡述了阻尼合金夾層的消音機理，試驗證明。

sentences.english: He deadened the noise of the machine with rubber mats.
sentences.chinese: 他用橡膠墊給機器消音。

sentences.english: With my tongue I can feel the silencer holes we drilled into the barrel of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 我的舌頭可以舔到槍管上我們鑿出來的一個個消音孔。

sentences.english: I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在槍上裝上消聲器，傑夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: A gun with a silencer fires once.
sentences.chinese: 一把帶着消音器的槍立即開火了。

sentences.english: He’s a craftsman whose specialties include hand-made bullets and silencers.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位手工藝者，長於土製子彈和消音器。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a silencing device applied in the electrical heating cooker, including an electrical heating cooker body.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種應用在電加熱炊具中的消音裝置。

sentences.english: Gunmen equipped with silencers then riddled his car with bullets.
sentences.chinese: 槍手用裝有消音器的槍向他的汽車射擊。

sentences.english: So far, the public outcry has been muted.
sentences.chinese: 至今，公衆的呼聲均被迫消音。
喜劇中心給劇集加了消音。

sentences.english: Once he was asked how he got the idea for the Maxim Silencer.
sentences.chinese: 一次，有人問他怎麼想到馬克西姆消音器這個點子。

sentences.english: After the mechanic replaced the silencer, my car was as right as a trivet.
sentences.chinese: 修理工更換了消音器後，我的汽車又正常了。

sentences.english: Model B: with sound insulating device, your good will will come true - close door, enjoy ventilation moment.
sentences.chinese: 模式可通過加消音通風器實現關着門換氣的美好願望。

sentences.english: The muffler is inside the heat shield.
sentences.chinese: 消音器安裝於加熱保護罩內部。

definition: see 後坐力|后坐力[hou4 zuo4 li4]
